problem_text_cn: 如图一把打开的雨伞可近似的看成一个圆锥,伞骨(面料下方能够把面料撑起来的支架)末端各点所在圆的直径AC长为12分米,伞骨AB长为9分米,那么制作这样的一把雨伞至少需要绸布面料为()平方分米．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, an open umbrella can be roughly regarded as a cone. The diameter of the circle at the end of the umbrella rib (the bracket that can support the fabric) is N_0 minutes, and the length of the umbrella rib AB is N_1 minutes, then To make such an umbrella, at least the silk fabric is () square minutes.
raw_answer: 解:∵圆锥的底面半径为\frac{1}{2}AC=6分米,母线AB为9分米,∴圆锥的侧面积=π×6×9=54π．故选:B．
